nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If nextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page.

nested_items.name: snapshots
nested_items.description: All of the returned snapshot objects.

nested_items.name: accountsWithProvisionedRestoreAccess
nested_items.description: All of the Amazon Web Services accounts that have access to restore a snapshot to a provisioned cluster.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: accountsWithRestoreAccess
nested_items.description: All of the Amazon Web Services accounts that have access to restore a snapshot to a namespace.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: actualIncrementalBackupSizeInMegaBytes
nested_items.description: The size of the incremental backup in megabytes.

nested_items.name: adminPasswordSecretArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the namespace's admin user credentials secret.

nested_items.name: adminPasswordSecretKmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Key Management Service (KMS) key used to encrypt and store the namespace's admin credentials secret.

nested_items.name: adminUsername
nested_items.description: The username of the database within a snapshot.

nested_items.name: backupProgressInMegaBytes
nested_items.description: The size in megabytes of the data that has been backed up to a snapshot.

nested_items.name: currentBackupRateInMegaBytesPerSecond
nested_items.description: The rate at which data is backed up into a snapshot in megabytes per second.

nested_items.name: elapsedTimeInSeconds
nested_items.description: The amount of time it took to back up data into a snapshot.

nested_items.name: estimatedSecondsToCompletion
nested_items.description: The estimated amount of seconds until the snapshot completes backup.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the KMS key used to encrypt the snapshot.

nested_items.name: namespaceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the namespace the snapshot was created from.

nested_items.name: namespaceName
nested_items.description: The name of the namepsace.

nested_items.name: ownerAccount
nested_items.description: The owner Amazon Web Services; account of the snapshot.

nested_items.name: snapshotArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the snapshot.

nested_items.name: snapshotCreateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the snapshot was created.

nested_items.name: snapshotName
nested_items.description: The name of the snapshot.

nested_items.name: snapshotRemainingDays
nested_items.description: The amount of days until the snapshot is deleted.

nested_items.name: snapshotRetentionPeriod
nested_items.description: The period of time, in days, of how long the snapshot is retained.

nested_items.name: snapshotRetentionStartTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when data within the snapshot started getting retained.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the snapshot.

nested_items.name: totalBackupSizeInMegaBytes
nested_items.description: The total size, in megabytes, of how big the snapshot is.
